Title: REATR Bronze Owl Pocket Watch Retro Quartz Watch with Gift Box for Christams

No one will ever know you are keeping time in this locket so that's a cute surprise. Introducing Highly Quality, Practial And Classical Pocket Watch: Elegant design with precise quartz movement within the analog display pockewatch. Retro styling case surface has light lace detailing on the front and back and looks convincingly vintage. Removable chain with a clip at the end, which is long enough to wear as a necklace or it can be used as a pocket watch This exquisite pocketwatch operates exactly the same way old pocket watch, It is a perfect choice for someone who loves Vintage stylesh. 100% brand new with excellent workmanship, quality assurance and durable utilization, We are committed to delivering a wonderful usage experience. Setting time and maintenance: Press the crown at the top of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. Daily water resistance(not for showering and swimming).
